auth.welcome_subtitle: Enter your credentials to continue your journey with us
auth.create_pin_description: Please create a 6-digit PIN that will be used to access your account
auth.verification_subtitle: Enter 6 digit verification code sent to your email and phone number

onboarding.slide1_description: Empower yourself with tools designed to keep you safe, informed, and connected anytime, anywhere.
onboarding.slide2_description: Access real-time alerts, emergency contacts, fake calls, and more to handle any situation with confidence.

home.add_close_subtitle: Add close people and friends for sos
home.journey_subtitle: Enter your destination, and the app will track your route in real-time.
home.community_description: Connect with others, share experiences and stay updated with safety tips.
home.report_incident_subtitle: File a detailed report about any safety incidents you've experienced.
home.empowerment_subtitle: Access skill development courses, financial tools, and resources for personal growth.
home.share_location_question: How would you like to share your location?
home.create_group_instructions: Please create a group with your close contacts. Once created, the location will be shared automatically.

contacts.title: Add Close People
contacts.maximum_contacts_message: You can only add up to {{max}} close contacts.
contacts.permission_message: Please allow access to contacts to add close people.

journey.title: Track Me
journey.subtitle: Track Me ensures your loved ones can monitor your location in real-time.
journey.sos_message: Do you want to send an SOS alert to your emergency contacts?

profile.title: My Profile
profile.location_description: Allow the app to share your location with your emergency contacts during SOS alerts
profile.notifications_description: Receive alerts and updates about your safety status and contacts
profile.auto_sos_description: Automatically send SOS alerts when unusual activity is detected
profile.dark_mode_description: Enable dark mode for better viewing in low light conditions
profile.logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
profile.delete_account_confirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
profile.confirm_deletion_message: Please confirm once more that you want to permanently delete your account.

errors.generic_error: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.permission_denied: Permission to access location was denied
errors.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalid_mobile: Please enter a valid mobile number
